title: BCE's Series AH Preferred Shares Cross 7% Yield Mark - Nasdaq.com
text: In trading on Tuesday, shares of BCE Inc's Series AH Preferred Shares (TSX: BCE-PRH.TO  ) were yielding above the 7% mark based on its monthly dividend (annualized to $0.9875), with shares changing hands as low as $13.70 on the day. As of last close, BCE.PRH was trading at a 44.00% discount to its liquidation preference amount. It should be noted that the preferred shares are convertible  .
